channel.title: MTMC - Next Generation MineCraft Experience[24/7][NO LAG][100+ Plugins][13+ Worl
channel.description:
MTMC Link To Server Page: http://www.planetminecraft.com/server/mtmc---the-next-gneration/ 8 Slots -> Next Upgrade: 12 Slots
IP: mtmc.verygames.net Looking For People To Make a Server Video! MUST BE A REGULAR PLAYER ON THE SERVER!
A Small MineCraft Server, but with a huge userbase, 100s of plugins and 13 whole worlds with different themes for you to explore, I think we just about make up for it! Our moderators will be ready to fix grief when you need it most. Also with fine tuned per-world permissions we never have an issue like "Oops, I think Permissions messed up.." that other servers have on a regular basis. Best of all? 24/7 and NO LAG.
Plugins
MapMarkers, SpoutEssentials, VoxelSniper, mcMMO, NanoBot, iConomy, Regios, DonationMeter, IBICF, VoxelDoop, NightLight, MultiVerse-Core, SpoutEssentials, MoveCraft, WorldEdit, NarrateMyLife, CommandBook, VirtualShop, Spout, MultiVerse-Portals, BCMusic, LWC and many more!
Ranks
Guest Member Trusted VIP (Donator) Moderator Admin Op
Worlds
World Void Creative FluffyWorld Sky World_Nether Redtech Survival Flatlands Plotlands RPGWorld
How To Apply!
What?? No application?? NO! Just join, complete the test and play!

8 Slots -> Next Upgrade: 12 Slots

Looking For People To Make a Server Video! MUST BE A REGULAR PLAYER ON THE SERVER!

A Small MineCraft Server, but with a huge userbase, 100s of plugins and 13 whole worlds with different themes for you to explore, I think we just about make up for it! Our moderators will be ready to fix grief when you need it most. Also with fine tuned per-world permissions we never have an issue like “Oops, I think Permissions messed up…” that other servers have on a regular basis. Best of all? 24/7 and NO LAG.
